That was intentional... if there are any "good" games in the Sandpit, they should probably be recategorised as something else.

But I'm willing to reconsider - there are quite a lot of Sandpit games though so they may not be easy to browse within Quest's game browser.

Okay, I understand. There are a lot of awful ones indeed. I just like trying them and coming up with suggestions to improve them. I'll just do that via the website. There are good sandpit games though, and it would be a shame not to put those in the system.
